favourite.article: Lord, make Your habitation in us!

What a beautiful hymn... Listening to the music and singing along by looking at the lyrics, I was moved to tears when I reached the last verse. Oh praise the Lord for His economy and thank You for inspiring Br. Howard Higashi to write this beautiful hymn. Oh the beauty of His churches, the golden lampstands!!

Our destiny and future is Zion. Our goal is Mt. Zion. Forgive me Lord, these tears are only for You, not merely on the emotion that I am feeling right now. Lord Jesus be gracious to us. I want to set my eyes looking always to Your habitation. Lord we pray that Your kingdom will be done on this earth. Zion. Praise the Lord Jesus. These tears are for You Lord Jesus. my Lord and my God! Hallelujah!
This hymn became more real to me after I had read Psalm 131. I really love this hymn.

This song reminds me of how beautiful the Lord is: Christ as the Head, and the church as His Body. This Zion is our enjoyment of the Lord, not only for the coming age, but at the present-a foretaste. We need to be always mingled, one with Him, abiding in Him. Lord Jesus, we need to be always found in You. Lord, we can do nothing without You. Give us Yourself more and more to be able to love You with Yourself to the uttermost. Amen. Praise the Lord!!!

Praise God! The Lord is preparing His virgins. Let us pray for each other to be ready to be gathered in at the great and final harvest. God is so holy and so wonderful! Brothers and sisters, we are going home soon!
This is the ultimate desire of the Lord.
I first found this song, because I have a friend named Zion, so then this song came up to me.
Oh Lord Jesus Christ, I love You...You are my life. Without You beside me, I would be nothing. God mingling with man, forever...
What a song and what a life we have in Zion! Everything on this earth is vanity; only Zion, the mingling of God and man, is reality. Amen saints! Let's press on together for this reality!
Praise the Lord that we can enjoy Christ in Zion. We will become Zion, the mingling of God and Man. Amen!!! O Lord Jesus!
My beautiful Zion. Precious indeed.
PTL! For He is the reality of Zion that living now within us. PTL for this Zion, this Zion is our enjoyment and this Zion today is the church of the living GOD. Amen.

Today our Triune God is moving and working as the living Zion. His beauty is in the Body. But His heart desire and His ultimate dwelling place is Zion, where He and His bride are just oneness. Praise the Lord...Today He is gaining us from deep within and He wants us to be one with Him no matter what....so on that day we can be His soldiers to bring in His kingdom. Brothers and sisters, may we all be encouraged and strengthened by this marvelous revelation---Zion!
Dear brothers and sisters, Zion is inside Jerusalem, our God habitation, where His overcomers enjoy His presence.... Beautiful Zion...
Brothers and sisters, praise the Lord all the time, and always fix your heart on Him. Be in the spirit and grow daily..

In this song there are long words and sometimes when I listen to this song I would think "How does our living God make these words?" But praise the Lord He made these words so that we can fellowship and praise the living God!
"The Lord's recovery is to build up ZION!" The young people is always sing this for the biulding up of the Body of Christ... i love to sing Zion!!!

Praise the Lord!
"Zion: in God we are abiding, Our oneness and living, The processed God our all, Zion, the ultimate blessing, Of God and man mingling, The triune God dispensing."
Such a marvellous revelation!
I like it very much because this shows what our final goal is and what I have to fight for. God mingled with man forever! The greatest enjoyment!
